<h3 id="X32141">X(32141) = X(5)-OF-ANTI-MANDART-INCIRCLE TRIANGLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(a^6-(b+c)*a^5-2*(b^2+c^2)*a^4+2*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^3+(b^4+c^4-(b+c)^2*b*c)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2*b*c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(32141) = 3*X(165)+X(5534) = 3*X(165)-X(24467) = 3*X(3158)+X(5709) = 3*X(4421)-X(11248) = 3*X(4421)+X(11500) = X(12338)+3*X(22556)</b>

<p>
X(32141) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these lines: {i,j}: {3913, 11249}, {5534, 24467}, {6796, 8715}, {6985, 10306}, {11248, 11500}, {12334, 13204}<br>
X(32141) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5450, 26086), (10943, 140), (32153, 3)<br>
X(32141) = X(156)-of-1st circumperp triangle<br>
X(32141) = X(1483)-of-2nd circumperp tangential triangle<br>
X(32141) = X(13561)-of-excentral triangle<br>
X(32141) = X(26286)-of-inner-Garcia triangle<br>
X(32141) = X(32138)-of-2nd circumperp triangle<br>
X(32141) = X(32153)-of-ABC-X3 reflections triangle<br>
X(32141) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 5687, 5690), (3, 18526, 104), (100, 11491, 3)<br>
</p>
